backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining cemetery management system types (GraveRecord, DeceasedPerson, GraveOwner, CemeteryState, SiteContent) and modules, integrating authorization, blob storage, and access control for grave records, alleys, user profiles, and public/admin content management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of an opaque background for the GraveDetailCard modal component to prevent underlying content from showing through.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages, describing their functionality, UI enhancements, query hooks, authorization handling, and recent fixes including improved spacing, typography, and user interactions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the cemetery management system application with viewport meta tag and script reference to the React TypeScript main module.
frontend/publish-live.build64.txt: Deployment trigger marker file for build 64 with no functional changes, used solely to trigger CI/CD pipeline for Live deployment.
frontend/redeploy-trigger.build63.txt: Operational redeploy trigger file for build 63 to force CI/CD artifact generation and retry deployment after an error, containing no functional changes.
frontend/redeploy-trigger.build64.txt: Operational redeploy trigger file for build 64 to produce new CI/CD build artifact with no application logic or behavioral changes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with QueryClient setup, actor initialization with retry logic and timeout detection, authentication flow, profile setup modal, admin authorization checks, private preview gating, and lazy-loaded routing between public and admin views.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying a shield icon and message for unauthorized users attempting to access admin-locked features, with a logout button to clear authentication.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitializat: Error screen component displayed when actor initialization fails, providing retry functionality and troubleshooting suggestions including page refresh, connection check, browser change, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Renders an interactive cemetery map showing all graves organized by alleys with color-coded status indicators, allowing admins to click graves to edit them via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Admin interface for managing cemetery structure, allowing creation and deletion of alleys and graves with confirmation dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: A dialog form for creating new graves or editing existing ones, including fields for location, status, payment dates, deceased persons, and owner information with full CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Admin component for managing cemetery graves with infinite scroll pagination, client-side full-text search using debounced input, and lazy-loaded create/edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for image processing including loading images, converting files to data URLs, and resizing images to fit max dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Reusable image upload component that handles file selection, preview, client-side resizing to specified dimensions, and upload progress tracking using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManagerDel: Boss-only component for managing delegated manager rights, allowing the owner to add or remove manager principals with validation and duplicate checking.
Generates a printable PDF report of all cemetery graves organized by alley, including deceased persons, owners, payment status, and expiration dates.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin interface for editing site-wide content including hero section, parish footer details, prayer texts, cemetery information, and logo/background images.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Connection status alert component that monitors backend health, displays loading/disconnected states with appropriate icons, and provides a retry button to recheck connection when actor errors occur.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating action button positioned at bottom-right corner that triggers Internet Identity login flow, with disabled state during login process and error handling for edge cases.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer component displaying parish information (name, address, mass times, contact details, bank account with copy functionality), social media links, and donation information fetched from the backend. Includes decorative background texture and responsive layout.
Displays a modal dialog with detailed information about a grave including location (alley, plot number), status badge, deceased persons list with dates, and payment status messages. Supports both PublicTileData and PublicGraveResult types with status-based styling.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Renders a paginated list of grave search results with load-more functionality, displaying grave details (location, deceased persons, status, contact info) in cards. Supports both admin (full GraveRecord) and public (PublicGraveResult) views with click-to-edit or click-to-view-details behavior.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Provides a search interface for graves with debounced full-text search across all grave fields using precomputed search indices. Supports both admin mode (infinite pagination of full records) and public mode (all public graves), with in-memory filtering and load-more functionality.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Displays an interactive cemetery map organized by alleys, rendering graves as colored tiles based on payment status with tooltips and click-to-view-details. Includes a status legend and uses lazy mounting for performance optimization.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with parish logo (custom or fallback), title, theme toggle button, and logout button for authenticated users. Logo source is fetched from backend site content or uses static asset as fallback.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with a background image, headline, Bible quote, and intro paragraph, all fetched from site content with loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LazyMount.tsx: A component that defers mounting its children until they are near the viewport using intersection observer, useful for performance optimization of heavy content.
frontend/src/components/PrivatePreviewBa: Displays an alert banner at the top of the app indicating that it's running in Private Preview Mode for internal testing only.
frontend/src/components/PrivatePreviewGa: Blocks access to public content in Private Preview Mode for unauthenticated users, showing a login prompt with Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name and optional email to complete their profile setup, with form validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Renders a grid of four interactive tiles (map, search, prayer, about) that navigate to different sections of the public cemetery interface.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Displays a warning alert banner when site content fails to load, informing users that default information is being shown instead.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Checks if the authenticated user has admin privileges (boss or manager role) by querying the backend actor's getAccessRole method.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Periodically checks backend connectivity via healthCheck() calls, returning connection status and providing a recheck function that invalidates the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a value by delaying updates until after a specified delay (default 300ms) using setTimeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and delegation validation using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Detects when an element enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver with configurable threshold, rootMargin, and triggerOnce options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrivatePreviewMode: Manages private preview mode state via URL hash parameter (#caffeinePrivatePreview=true/disable), persisting the state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including manager delegation, site content, graves, cemetery views, and user profiles with error handling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, including stone/parchment light theme and navy/gold dark theme with tile-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page with lazy-loaded tabs for grave management, cemetery layout, map view, search, PDF export, site content editing, and manager delegation (boss-only). Uses role-based authorization to conditionally show the managers tab.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Public-facing page with hero section, tile navigation, and tabs for grave search and map view. Includes scrollable sections for prayer content and cemetery information loaded from site content API.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect and classify backend authorization errors (boss-lock, manager-lock, general auth failures) and distinguish them from connectivity issues. Includes helpers for access control initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: In-memory full-text search utilities for grave records with separate functions for admin mode (searches all fields including owner data) and public mode (searches only deceased names and year of death). Supports early exit with maxResults parameter.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Shared styling utilities for grave status visualization providing consistent colors, hover effects, and badge variants for paid, unpaid, reserved, and free grave statuses across tile maps and search results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens. Includes functions to extract, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, tile, and chart colors), container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Cemetery Manager application tracking a known transparency issue with the grave detail card modal and an existing feature to add an opaque background to the GraveDetailCard component.
